post.summary: This API is used to create a new architecture from scratch

404.description: The target User is not found.

404.description: The target Architecture is not found.

parameters.name: accessToken
parameters.description: User's OIDC token(Only for CloudDeploymentModel in internal version).

requestBody.description: The request body as per client's needs

schema.description: The request body as per client's needs

404.description: The target arch's ToC Template is not found.

country.description: Country user chose when user accepted privacy.

interestTechnologies.description: User interest technologies. Not in use.

interestIndustries.description: User interest industries. Not in use.

penHoldDuration.description: User pen hold duration time. Not in use.

defaultTemplate.description: Default template id user set when user creates arch.

defaultGithubInfo.description: User github info for export architecture to github.

notesId.description: User Notes ID from Blue Page. Only for IBM internal user.

jobResponsibilities.description: User job reponsibilities from Blue Page. Only for IBM internal user.

avatar.description: User avatar from Blue Page. Only for IBM internal user.

bookmarkedArchList.description: Architecture id list the user bookmarked.

geographies.description: User geographies list from Blue Page. Only for IBM internal user.

businessUnits.description: User business units list from Blue Page. Only for IBM internal user.

collaborationGroups.description: Collaboration groups id user created. If the user has no collaboration group, the value is [].

coreTechElements.description: Core technology elements of this architecture

expireDate.description: Expire date of peer review request

created.description: Created time of peer review request

manualExpireDate.description: If the peer review request is stopped manually by request owner, then the manualExpireDate is the actual expiration date.

coreTechElements.description: Core technology elements of this architecture

expireDate.description: Expire date of peer review request

isSuccess.description: To identify whether the api executes successfully. If the whole api succeeds, the value is true. Otherwise it is undefined.

warningMessage.description: Message of errors or warnings that do not block the main process.

type.description: Architecture type, should be 'Solution', or will lead to 400 error.

castSolutionId.description: A foriegn key to CAST, only required for the CAST team, for internal call just leave it as empty.

tags.description: Tags the architecture attached to. Please contact with CA team to get the latest value list.

taxonomies.description: Taxonomies attached to this architecture. Please refer the value in the array: ["Be more responsive", "Become more digital", "Grow the top line", "Modernize ways of working", "Reduce business costs", "Integrating apps & data", "IT Costs", "Lack of IT Skills", "Project Delivery Time", "Unreliable IT", "Vendor Lock-in"].

industries.description: Industries the architecture belong to. Please refer the value in the array: ["Aerospace and Defense", "Banking & FM", "Chemical & Petroleum", "Consumer", "Cross-Industry", "Education", "Electronics", "Energy & Utilities", "Government", "Healthcare & Life Sciences", "Industrial Products", "Insurance", "Telecommunications, Media & Entertainment", "Travel & Transportation"].

technologies.description: Technologies the architecture used. Please refer the value in the array: ["Analytics", "Blockchain", "Cloud Computing", "Cognitive Computing", "Conversational Services & Chatbots", "Internet of Things", "Mobile Computing", "Security", "Systems Infrastructure"].

businessCapabilities.description: Not supported, leave the array empty for now.

technicalCapabilities.description: Not supported, leave the array empty for now.

tocTemplateId.description: The ToCtemplateId user chose, if not provided, using default tocTemplateId = template_company_ibm

isDefaultTemplate.description: Set it true/false to make ToCtemplate as default or not, using default isDefaultTemplate = false.

industries.description: Leave it as null if not needed.

technologies.description: Leave it as null if not needed.

businessCapabilities.description: Leave it as null if not needed.

technicalCapabilities.description: Leave it as null if not needed.

tags.description: Leave it as null if not needed.

clientName.description: Client's name, should be existed or will lead to 400 error.

salesConnectNum.description: Seller's connection number, should be existed or will lead to 400 error.

castSolutionId.description: CAST related parameter, leave it as null if not needed.

archVisibility.description: IBM only or Kyndryl only or bu,geo(eg.IBM/Kyndryl/GBS/NA/EMEA)
IBM only or Kyndryl only or bu,geo(eg.IBM/Kyndryl/GBS/NA/EMEA)

castSolutionId.description: If this arch is created by CAST, then will have this castSolutionId field.

isAsIs.description: If arch is shared As-Is, then the value is true. Otherwise, the value is false.

isDiscoverable.description: Pending arch only included in search result when value is true

template.description: ToC Template info for this architecture.

content.description: The content of the comment, can't be null.

targetTemplateId.description: The template Id of target architecture

tocMapping.description: The toc mapping indicating where the instances are copied to. [{instanceId:xx, artifactTypeId:xx}]

displayName.description: Artifact name displays in ToC catalog.

globalTOCPosition.description: Number displays in the beginning of each item in ToC catalog.

hasContent.description: If there is any artifact instance under this artifact section, then hasContent is true.

artifactTypeName.description:
ArtifactTypeName corresponds to a section displayName within the architectureâ€™s TOC template. For the default TOC template, the mapping between artifactTypeName and artifactType are
'Overview' - 'assetartifact_executivesummary', 
'Business Challenge' - 'assetartifact_businesschallenge', 
'System Context' - 'assetartifact_systemcontext', 
'Use Case Diagram'- 'assetartifact_usecase_ucdiagram', 
'Use Case' - 'assetartifact_usecase_uctext', 
'Functional Requirements' - 'assetartifact_functionalrequirement', 
'Non Functional Requirements' - 'assetartifact_nonfunctionalrequirement', 
'Logical Data Model' - 'assetartifact_logical_datamodel', 
'Services View' - 'assetartifact_architectureoverview_aodservice', 
'Enterprise View' - 'assetartifact_architectureoverview_enterprise', 
'IT System View' - 'assetartifact_architectureoverview_itsystem', 
'Usage Scenario' - 'assetartifact_architectureoverview_usagescenario', 
'Architectural Decisions' - 'assetartifact_architecturedecision', 
'Static View' - 'assetartifact_componentmodel_staticview', 
'Sequence View' - 'assetartifact_componentmodel_dynamicview', 
'Collaboration View' - 'assetartifact_componentmodel_collaborationdiagram', 
'Logical Operational View' - 'assetartifact_operationalmodel_logicaloperational', 
'Prescribed Operational View' - 'assetartifact_operationalmodel_physicaloperational', 
'Cloud Deployment Model' - 'assetartifact_deploymentmodel_cloud' , 
'Risks' - 'assetartifact_risk', 
'Assumptions' - 'assetartifact_assumption', 
'Issues' - 'assetartifact_issue',  
'Dependencies' - 'assetartifact_dependency', 
'Architectural Principles' - 'assetartifact_architecture_principles', 
'Misc Diagram' - 'assetartifact_miscdiagram', 
'Notes' - 'assetartifact_notes'.

uiInfo.description: MxGraph XML, only required for the graphic instances.

coreInfo.description: The core information of the instance.

projectId.description: The cloud template Id which will be associated/copied. Applicable for CDM.

projectDescription.description: The cloud template description which will be associated/copied. Applicable for CDM.

mazeActionType.description: 1)create-create a new cloud template along with the new CDM instance; 3)copy-copy an existing cloud template;

deleteSource.description: If the source misc diagram instance will be removed after this copy, then the value is true. Otherwise is false.

viewMode.description: If anyone else is editing this instance, set viewMode as true, else false.

newId.description: New id of the instance, only used for 'UseCase', 'ArchitecturalDecision', 'FunctionalRequirement' and 'NonFunctionalRequirement'.

duration.description: Remain time of the architecture pen, default as 14400.

castSolutionId.description: primary key in reference to solution advisor.

isGlobalDefaultTemplate.description: If the ToC Template is global default template, then the value is true. Otherwise, it is false.

selectGenericGroup.description: whether need to export Generic Groups

selectLogicalComponents.description: whether need to export logical comonents

selectLogicalNodes.description: whether need to export logical nodes

selectPhysicalComponents.description: whether need to export physical components

selectDeploymentUnits.description: whether need to export deploy units

selectPhysicalNodes.description: whether need to export physical nodes

selectNodePlusImplementation.description: whether need to export logical nodes & physical components

selectBusinessChallenge.description: whether need to export business challenge

selectFunctionalRequirements.description: whether need to export functional requirements

selectNonFunctionalRequirements.description: whether need to export non functional requirements

selectArchitecturalDecisions.description: whether need to export architectural decisions

selectArchitecturePrinciples.description: whether need to export architectural principles

selectDiagramIndex.description: whether need to export index of the diagrams

selectSystemContext.description: whether need to export system context

selectCMStaticView.description: whether need to export cmstatic view

selectCMDynamicView.description: whether need to export cmdynamic view

selectUsageScenario.description: whether need to export usage scenario

solAreaName.description: supported area name, provided by solution advisor.

refreshDate.description: Date time user got the pen.

child.description: Sub-section or content of this section.

artifactTypeName.description: assetartifacttype name of the instance id

artifactTypeId.description: assetartifacttype id of the instance id

artifactTypeDisplayName.description: assetartifacttype display name of the instance id

nameChanged.description: if the architecture name is already exists, it will be true, and the arch will be renamed automatically.

isNameSpecial.description: if the architecture name contains special charactor then true else false

createdArchId.description: if arch is created successfully, then return the new created arch id

orderBy.description: The sort strategy of the result, only support by 'name' and by 'lastModified'.

publishAsIsAssetDiscoverUserCount.description: published As Is Asset Discover User number

publishAsIsAssetNonDiscoverUserCount.description: published AsIs Asset Non Discover User number
